隋.definition: the Sui dynasty (581-617 AD); surname Sui

隋唐演義.definition: Dramatized History of Sui and Tang, novel by Qing dynasty author Chu Renhuo 褚人獲|褚人获[Chu3 Ren2 huo4]

隋文帝.definition: Wendi (541-604), posthumous name of the first Sui emperor, reigned 581-604

隋書.definition: History of the Sui Dynasty, thirteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Wei Zheng 魏徵|魏征[Wei4 Zheng1] in 636 during Tang Dynasty, 85 scrolls

隋末.definition: last years of the Sui dynasty; early 7th century AD

隋煬帝.definition: Emperor Yang of Sui (569-618), said to have murdered his father and brother to seize the throne, reigned 604-618
